value.name: Heaton joins GOP lawmakers opposing IU vaccination rule
value.description: May 28—A Terre Haute state representative is among 19 Republican lawmakers seeking to stop Indiana University from requiring COVID-19 vaccinations before participating in the upcoming fall semester.
